description: National Capacity Building for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights for Greater Access to Justice

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description: Capacity development at institutional/organizational level to build and upgrade the facilities of the project's core management/implementation team including the Center for Human Rights Studies of Tehran University (CHRS), Chair for Human Rights, Peace and Democracy of Shahid Behshti University (CHRPD), Center for Human Rights of Mofid University (CHR), Human Rights (HR) CSOs, Islamic Human Rights Comission (IHRC), Center for Judicial Training and Research (CJTR), Faculty of Journalist Association (FJA), and the Bar Association (BA).
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: CD at Institutional level

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description: Capacity development through exchange of international learning experiences/knowledge sharing, twinning arrangements, networking and mentoring with other potential partners both at the organizational and individual levels
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Learning & Knowledge Sharing

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description: Capacity development through expanding legal education by offering specialized human rights training courses offered to human rights defenders, basic human rights courses conducted for different categories of target groups, and operational and applied human rights research and studies undertaken
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Expanding Legal Education

title: CAPACITY BUILDING FOR PROMOTION OF HUMAN RIGHTS
